other_title: ぷちます！－プチ・アイドルマスター－
opening_theme: "La♪ La♪ La♪ Wonderland (ら♪ら♪ら♪わんだぁらんど)" by 765PRO ALLSTARS featuring Puchidol (ぷちどる)
ending_theme: #1: "A Ri Ga To YESTERDAYS (あ・り・が・と・YESTERDAYS)" by Haruka Amami & Ritsuko Akizuki & Makoto Kikuchi & Miki Hoshii (Eriko Nakamura & Naomi Wakabayashi & Hiromi Hirata & Akiko Hasegawa) (eps 1-23)
#2: "TODAY with ME" by Chihaya Kisaragi & Yukiho Hagiwara & Ami Futami & Mami Futami & Hibiki Ganaha (Asami Imai & Azumi Asakura & Asami Shimoda & Manami Numakura) (eps 24-43)
#3: "Maybe TOMORROW" by Yayoi Takatsuki & Azusa Miura & Iori Minase & Takane Shijou (Mayako Nigo & Chiaki Takahashi & Rie Kugimiya & Yumi Hara) (eps 44-64)
